name: rfid-platform
description: Enterprise-grade RFID tracking platform for textile & apparel factories

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter dashboard dev" "pnpm --filter gateway dev" "pnpm --filter ingest-worker dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter dashboard build && pnpm --filter gateway build && pnpm --filter ingest-worker build
scripts.start: concurrently "pnpm --filter dashboard start" "pnpm --filter gateway start" "pnpm --filter ingest-worker start"
scripts.test: pnpm --filter dashboard test && pnpm --filter gateway test && pnpm --filter ingest-worker test
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter dashboard lint && pnpm --filter gateway lint
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter dashboard typecheck && pnpm --filter gateway typecheck
scripts.verify: pnpm typecheck && pnpm lint && pnpm test
scripts.deploy: pnpm deploy:dashboard && pnpm deploy:gateway && pnpm deploy:worker
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter dashboard clean && pnpm --filter gateway clean && pnpm --filter ingest-worker clean
